Users

Class TrainDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • Users.User
      • Users.TrainDriver

  • public class TrainDriver
extends User
    OVERVIEW: This mutable abstraction represents a Train Driver who can change the state of a Train. AF(c) = a user, c, with a name and password of super.getName() and c.password. this user drives a train c.currentTrainBeingGiven and has an internal id of c.id. Rep Invariant : password != null
